comprehensive_overview: Lowcharts is a Python library for creating basic low-level charts with a simplistic and minimalistic interface. It aims to provide users with an easy-to-use tool for generating simple line charts, bar charts, and scatter plots.
core_features:
1. Easy-to-use interface for creating basic charts.
2. Supports line charts, bar charts, and scatter plots.
3. Lightweight and minimalistic design.
4. Open-source and customizable.
